content.title: Update: Exciting news - Ethernet is upgrading to 2.5G!
content.creator:
MacroDock
February 8, 2025
content.content:
Dear Backers,
First and foremost, we want to express our heartfelt thanks for your incredible support. Thanks to your enthusiasm, our campaign reached its funding goal within just 24 hours!
We’ve been receiving a lot of valuable feedback, and one request that’s come up consistently is to upgrade the Ethernet port from 1G to 2.5G. We’re thrilled to announce that, based on your feedback, we’re moving forward with this upgrade!
This will ensure that MacroDock will be even more future-proof, providing faster, more reliable connectivity for all your professional and personal needs.
Stay tuned for more updates, and thank you again for your amazing support!
MacroDock Team
